amendment.description: To require the comptroller General to conduct a study of transition assistance provided for members of Armed Forces being discharged of released from active duty; to require a related study; and to add to content of preseparation counseling for the members.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3399 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3399 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To require the comptroller General to conduct a study of transition assistance provided for members of Armed Forces being discharged of released from active duty; to require a related study; and to add to content of preseparation counseling for the members.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3399 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3399 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Feingold.
